Package game

Class OthelloBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.OthelloBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board
    public class OthelloBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Board
    This class is the implementation of the Board. Specifically the board used for clientside games and calculations.

      • DIM

        public static final int DIM
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • OthelloBoard

        public OthelloBoard()
        The constructor creates a list of length 36 of all the fields on the board. All fields are set to Mark.EMPTY. Then sets some fields to the starting setup.

      • OthelloBoard

        public OthelloBoard​(BoardConfiguration configuration)
        To create a new Board for Othello. It creates a board for an 8 by 8 game and it fills the board. Then it calls setup to set up the board configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration which the game starts at

      • calculateFlips

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> calculateFlips​(int newMove,
                                                           Mark mark)
        Description copied from interface: Board
        Calculates the flips needed for the board to update. It searches from the new move in all eight directions. When it hits an empty field or the edge, it discards this direction. If it hits a field with the other mark for x times in a row, and then hits its own mark, it puts those other marked fields in the list.
        Specified by:
        calculateFlips in interface Board
        Parameters:
        newMove - the index of the move that was made
        mark - the mark of the move just made
        Returns:
        A list of all indexes to flip.
